about.top-text: I am a self-taught web developer and programmer and a guy slighty obsessed with code quality.
about.bottom-text: I build new projects and love to get more project ideas from others. I am a fast learner and a good problem solver. While I am still a college student, I still like to learn more about programming and love to build new projects.

projects.name: Book-Lister
projects.description: Search, find, and add books to your list. A reading list web-app developed using React js and the Google Books API.

projects.name: Searchia
projects.description: A search engine clone built with React js that takes a query and returns search results. Created with the help of Google Search API.

projects.name: Promethewz
projects.description: Desktop Screen recorder application developed using ElectronJS (JavaScript framework). Built installer for Windows OS users.

projects.name: Shortly
projects.description: A URL shortener website built with React js and SHRTCODE API. Instantly provides 3 shortened URL(s) for your link.

projects.name: Corona-AI
projects.description: A website for COVID-19 info worldwide.

projects.name: Wordzz
projects.description: English dictionary web app with paper-like UI.

projects.name: MLBB Heroes
projects.description: Information about popular game (Mobile Legends) heroes. Created with React JS and Node REST API.

projects.name: To-do list Z
projects.description: A to-do list web app with cool features.

projects.name: Drawing Machine
projects.description: Web app for drawing and downloading the image. Built with vanilla JavaScript.

projects.name: LimoLight
projects.description: Website template for a food delivery app. Created with HTML5, CSS3 and JavaScript.

projects.name: Leave a Message
projects.description: PHP CRUD application that asks and stores information from the visitors.

projects.name: Quran reader
projects.description: A fullstack(Node.js + React), low-size(~700kb) Quran reader app.

projects.name: Portfolio Template
projects.description: A portfolio website template created with Bootstrap and PHP.

projects.name: Info Bottle
projects.description: A ReactJS web application which shows information about ongoing and upcoming animes.

projects.name: Covid Counter
projects.description: PHP web-app built with scrape functionality that shows real-time data of COVID-19 patients.
